summary:
Stably adds AVAX to Stably Ramp - Stably Ramp now supports AVAX on its fiat-to-crypto on and off-ramp platform.

 Stably Ramp Lists SOL - Stably Ramp has added SOL to its list of supported assets.

 MonkeyZoo Integrates with Stably Ramp - MonkeyZoo has partnered with Stably Ramp for its fiat-to-crypto on and off-ramp services.
